changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "account_activity" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "kind" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "message" TEXT NULL, "metadata" JSONB NULL, "account_id" UUID NULL, "organization_id" UUID NULL, "cluster_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("account_id") REFERENCES "account" ("id") ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("organization_id") REFERENCES "organization" ("id") ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("cluster_id") REFERENCES "cluster" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE ); CREATE INDEX "idx_account_activity_cluster_id" ON "account_activity" ("cluster_id"); CREATE INDEX "idx_account_activity_account_id" ON "account_activity" ("account_id") WHERE "account_id" IS NOT NULL;
